thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-North China Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit down 50 pct to 70 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-North China Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit down 50 pct to 70 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - north china pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 31(Reuters) - North China Pharmaceutical Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 50 percent to 70 percent, or to decreased by 27 million yuan to 38 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 54.4 million yuan
* The reason for the forecast is contribution of preparation products
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/LyvCeG Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
